name: chisatoai-browser-addon
description: The browser add-on of Chisato AI.

scripts.prebuild:
rm -rf dist && echo "Name: NekoTranslate Browser Extension
Version: $npm_package_version
Date: $(date +'%Y-%m-%d')
Commit: $(git rev-parse HEAD)
Github: https://github.com/thenekodev/nekotranslate-browser-extension/
Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/nekotranslate/
Chrome: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/nekotranslate/bfnogphiljblendaojncdniiflinefkk/" > src/info.txt
scripts.build:firefox: npm run prebuild && TARGET_BROWSER=firefox webpack --mode production && npm run postbuild
